Rhythmyx 6 Public API

Package com.percussion.extension

Interface Summary
IPSAssemblyLocation This interface specifies the functionality to be implemented by all content assembler location generators.
IPSExtension IPSExtension is a lightweight interface to be implemented by extensions of any kind.
IPSExtensionDef An IPSExtensionDef defines an extension and its deployment settings, including the URLs of all its resources.
IPSExtensionDefFactory The IPSExtensionDefFactory interface defines methods for serializing and deserializing whole extension defs.
IPSExtensionErrors Numeric definitions for system error exceptions
IPSExtensionHandler An extension handler is directly responsible for loading, storing, and managing extensions of a particular type.
IPSExtensionParamDef The extension param def provides the name, type, and description of a runtime parameter that is used or required by an extension.
IPSFieldInputTransformer This interface must be implemented by extensions that are used as field input transformers.
IPSFieldOutputTransformer This interface must be implemented by extensions that are used as field output transformers.
IPSFieldValidator This interface must be implemented by extensions that are used as field validators.
IPSFieldVisibilityRule This is a 'marker' interface that allows client applications to categorize the base extensions based on where they are used within the content type.
IPSItemInputTransformer This is a 'marker' interface that allows client applications to categorize the base extensions based on where they are used within the content type.
IPSItemOutputTransformer This is a 'marker' interface that allows client applications to categorize the base extensions based on where they are used within the content type.
IPSItemValidator The IPSItemValidator interface must be implemented by extensions which are item validators.
IPSJexlExpression Marker interface for jexl function bindings.
IPSRequestPreProcessor The IPSRequestPreProcessor interface must be implemented by extensions which pre-process the request.
IPSResultDocumentProcessor The IPSResultDocumentProcessor interface must be implemented by extensions which process the result document.
IPSUdfProcessor This interface is implemented by extensions capable of handling user defined functions (UDFs).
IPSWorkflowAction The IPSWorkflowAction interface must be implemented by extensions which represent "workflow actions," which are actions that are performed on documents in the workflow only under particular conditions (e.g.
IPSWorkFlowContext This interface provides a convenient way to bundle together information needed to process a workflow content item.
 

Class Summary
PSDefaultExtension A simple abstract class that has a default implementation for the IPSExtension interface methods.
PSExtensionParams Extension utilities to extract parameters, etc.
PSExtensionRef A simple, immutable class used to refer uniquely to an extension by its handler name, context within the handler, and the extension name itself.
PSJexlUtilBase A base class for Jexl based extensions.
PSSimpleJavaUdfExtension A simple abstract class that has a default implementation for the IPSExtension interface methods.
PSValidateUniqueName System extension used to validate the sys_title field for a Content Editor only.
 

Exception Summary
PSExtensionException Exception class for exceptional error conditions relating to extensions, extension handlers, and extension managers.
PSExtensionProcessingException PSExtensionProcessingException is thrown by classes implementing IPSRequestPreProcessor and similar extension sub-interfaces to indicate that a processing error occurred.
PSParameterMismatchException PSParameterMismatchException is thrown to indicate that an extension or extension was initialized with the incorrect parameter values.
 

Annotation Types Summary
IPSJexlMethod Annotation interface that allows the extension manager to obtain a per method description and parameter descriptions via reflection
IPSJexlParam Describe a single parameter.
